${ModID}:VestOfManyPockets.NAME: Vest Of Many Pockets
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat you can draw !R! card then discard !R! card.

${ModID}:NecklaceOfShielding.NAME: Necklace of Shielding
${ModID}:NecklaceOfShielding.FLAVOR: It's a little unstable, but it works.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat gain !R2! #yBlock and discard a card.

${ModID}:BlessedNecklace.NAME: Blessed Necklace
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#DF9D2B]Necklace [#DF9D2B]of [#DF9D2B]Shielding. #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat gain !R! Block and draw !R2! cards.

${ModID}:TormentorsMask.NAME: Tormentor's Mask
${ModID}:TormentorsMask.FLAVOR: It looks like a Halloween mask. But the facial features move on their own.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply !R! #y${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TwistedShuriken.NAME: Twisted Shuriken
${ModID}:TwistedShuriken.FLAVOR: It looks menacing, but you aren't sure how to safely throw it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play !R! attacks in a single turn, apply !R2! #y${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RingOfWhispers.NAME: Ring of Whispers
${ModID}:RingOfWhispers.FLAVOR: The bearers of this ring all slowly went mad.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse, gain !R! #yBlock. On pickup, obtain #yWhispers.

${ModID}:TuningFork.NAME: Tuning Fork
${ModID}:TuningFork.FLAVOR: It constantly makes a quiet hum. It never ends.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat the next #y${ModID}:Resonant card you play costs 0.

${ModID}:StoneScales.NAME: Stone Scales
${ModID}:StoneScales.FLAVOR: Whatever turned these scales to stone also melded them together.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat, for one turn, whenever you would take damage, take !R! less.

${ModID}:EtherealConverter.NAME: Ethereal Converter
${ModID}:EtherealConverter.FLAVOR: You have no idea how this works.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat you can turn your #yBlock into #yTemporary_HP.

${ModID}:TatteredCloak.NAME: TatteredCloak
${ModID}:TatteredCloak.FLAVOR: There's like 500 knives sewn to this thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, add a #yShiv into your hand.

${ModID}:EyeballStaff.NAME: Eyeball Staff
${ModID}:EyeballStaff.FLAVOR: You often catch the eye staring at you when you look at the staff, but it quickly looks away.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated. Once per combat you can Scry !R!. Play any #y${ModID}:Sigils you discard.

${ModID}:HereticBrand.NAME: HereticBrand
${ModID}:HereticBrand.FLAVOR: This mark forcibly burned onto your face warns everyone who you are.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Lose 20% Max HP.

${ModID}:BlueMarbles.NAME: Blue Marbles
${ModID}:BlueMarbles.FLAVOR: What an odd set of marbles, all different sizes.
DESCRIPTIONS: [${ModID}:IceIcon] damage applies double #y${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:VialOfBlackBlood.NAME: Vial of Black Blood
${ModID}:VialOfBlackBlood.FLAVOR: It is hot enough to almost burn you.
DESCRIPTIONS: [${ModID}:EldritchIcon] Attacks deal double damage and Exhaust.

${ModID}:ReverseOmamori.NAME: Reverse Omamori
${ModID}:ReverseOmamori.FLAVOR: It looks like an Omamori, but its spark of energy certainly isn't divine.
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #yCurse in your deck, start each combat with 1 #yDexterity. Upon pickup, add !R! [#EFC851]Clumsy to your deck.

${ModID}:Mythril.NAME: Mythril
${ModID}:Mythril.FLAVOR: It's extremely hard for something so light weight.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in hand, gain !R! #yBlock.

${ModID}:ShinyKazoo.NAME: Shiny Kazoo
${ModID}:ShinyKazoo.FLAVOR: You can feel its power, but you have too much dignity to actually play it.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each combat that you gain #yResonance, add a random #y${ModID}:Resonant card to your hand.

${ModID}:SneckoLeatherGloves.NAME: Snecko Leather Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #y${ModID}:Jinx to an enemy, it loses !R! HP.

${ModID}:HexedStaff.NAME: Hexed Staff
${ModID}:HexedStaff.FLAVOR: Whenever you hold it, you immediately feel angrier.

${ModID}:VoidBracelet.NAME: Void Bracelet
${ModID}:VoidBracelet.FLAVOR: It is always icy cold, even if you hold it in a fire.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in hand, gain !R! #yStrength and !R! #yDexterity.

${ModID}:M10Core.NAME: M10 Core
${ModID}:M10Core.FLAVOR: Occasionally you hear a series of beeps come from the core. They somehow sound mournful.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with !R! #y${ModID}:Charge.

${ModID}:Beastiary.NAME: Beastiary
${ModID}:Beastiary.FLAVOR: A very thorough encyclopedia of all monsters that can be encountered in or around the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: [${ModID}:ForceIcon] attacks do double damage against #yVulnerable targets, rather than +50%.
